question: Will Tottenham Hotspur qualify for the 2025–26 UEFA Champions League?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the listed team qualifies for the 2025-26 UEFA Champions League season. Otherwise, the market will resolve to “No”.

If it becomes impossible for the listed team to qualify for the 2025-26 UEFA Champions League season based on the rules of the competition, this market will immediately resolve to “No.”

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Warriors vs. Timberwolves
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for May 8 at 8:30PM ET:
If the Golden State Warriors win, the market will resolve to “Warriors”.
If the Minnesota Timberwolves win, the market will resolve to “Timberwolves”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Bitcoin Up or Down on May 9?
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTCUSDT 08 May 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the 09 May 12:00 ET candle.
This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTCUSDT 08 May 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the 09 May 12:00 ET candle.
If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTCUSDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTCUSDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Champions League Final: PSG vs. Inter Milan
description:
The market will resolve to "PSG" if Paris Saint-Germain wins the 2025 Champions League Final.

The market will resolve to "Inter" if inter Milan wins the 2025 Champions League Final.

If the Champions League Final has not been completed by December 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "50-50". 

The resolution source for this market will be Champions League (https://www.uefa.com/uefachampionsleague/).

question: Will Knicks vs. Thunder be the 2025 NBA Finals matchup?
description:
This market refers to the exact matchup in the 2025 NBA Finals.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if both listed teams compete in the 2025 NBA Finals. Otherwise, it will resolve to "No."

If at any point it becomes impossible for this matchup to occur in the NBA Finals based on the rules of the NBA (e.g. they are mathematically eliminated from reaching the NBA Finals), this market will resolve immediately to "No". 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the NBA.

question: Champions League Final: 3+ goals?
description:
This market refers to the Champions League final match between Paris Saint-Germain and Inter Milan scheduled for May 31, 3:00 PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if PSG and Inter Milan combine for more than 2.5 goals. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For this market, goals scored during extra time will count. However, goals from a penalty shoot-out will not be counted. 

If the Champions League Final has not been completed by July 15, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "50-50". 

The resolution source for this market will be Champions League (https://www.uefa.com/uefachampionsleague/).

question: Pakistan air/missile strike on Indian soil by Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Pakistan initiates an airstrike or missile strike on Indian soil between May 7, 2:30 PM ET and May 9, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a qualifying "strike" is defined as the use of aerial bombs or missiles (including cruise or ballistic missiles) launched by Pakistani military forces that impact Indian ground territory. 

Missiles or drones which are intercepted and surface-to-air missile strikes will not be sufficient for a "Yes" resolution regardless of whether they land on Indian territory or cause damage. 

Actions such as artillery fire, small arms fire, FPV or ATGM strikes along the line of control, ground incursions, naval shelling, cyberattacks, or sanctions, will not qualify.

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

Missiles or drones which are intercepted and surface-to-air missile strikes will not be sufficient for a "Yes" resolution regardless of whether they land on Indian territory or cause damage. 

Actions such as artillery fire, small arms fire, FPV or ATGM strikes along the line of control, ground incursions, naval shelling, cyberattacks, or sanctions, will not qualify.

question: Will 'Fight or Flight' gross more than $1.5m opening weekend?
description:
This market will resolve according to how much “Fight or Flight” (2025) will gross domestically on its opening weekend. The “Box Office” https://www.the-numbers.com/movie/Fight-or-Flight-(2025)#tab=summary will be used to resolve this market once the values for the 3-day opening weekend (May 9 - May 11) are final (i.e. not studio estimates).

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note, this market will resolve according to the The Numbers figures provided under Weekend Box Office Performance for the 3-day weekend (which typically includes Thursday's previews), regardless of whether domestic refers to only the USA, or to USA and Canada, etc.

If there is no final data available by May 19, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, another credible resolution source will be chosen.

events.title: "Fight or Flight" Opening Weekend Box Office
events.description:

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

If there is no final data available by May 19, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, another credible resolution source will be chosen.

description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the sculpture Grounded in the Stars by Thomas J. Price is physically removed from its installation site in Duffy Square (Broadway and 46th Street, New York City) by 11:59 PM ET on June 15, 2025. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Fed decreases interest rates by 50+ bps after September 2025 meeting?
description:
The FED interest rates are defined in this market by the upper bound of the target federal funds range. The decisions on the target federal fund range are made by the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meetings.

This market will resolve to the amount of basis points the upper bound of the target federal funds rate is changed by versus the level it was prior to the Federal Reserve's September 2025 meeting.

If the target federal funds rate is changed to a level not expressed in the displayed options, the change will be rounded up to the nearest 25 and will resolve to the relevant bracket. (e.g. if there's a cut/increase of 12.5 bps it will be considered to be 25 bps)

The resolution source for this market is the FOMC’s statement after its meeting scheduled for September 16 - 17, 2025 according to the official calendar: https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/fomccalendars.htm.

The level and change of the target federal funds rate is also published at the official website of the Federal Reserve at https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/openmarket.htm.

This market may resolve as soon as the FOMC’s statement for their September meeting with relevant data is issued. If no statement is released by the end date of the next scheduled meeting, this market will resolve to the "No change" bracket.

The FED interest rates are defined in this market by the upper bound of the target federal funds range. The decisions on the target federal fund range are made by the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meetings.

This market will resolve to the amount of basis points the upper bound of the target federal funds rate is changed by versus the level it was prior to the Federal Reserve's September 2025 meeting.

If the target federal funds rate is changed to a level not expressed in the displayed options, the change will be rounded up to the nearest 25 and will resolve to the relevant bracket. (e.g. if there's a cut/increase of 12.5 bps it will be considered to be 25 bps)

The resolution source for this market is the FOMC’s statement after its meeting scheduled for September 16 - 17, 2025 according to the official calendar: https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/fomccalendars.htm.

The level and change of the target federal funds rate is also published at the official website of the Federal Reserve at https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/openmarket.htm.

This market may resolve as soon as the FOMC’s statement for their September meeting with relevant data is issued. If no statement is released by the end date of the next scheduled meeting, this market will resolve to the "No change" bracket.

question: Will Han Duck-soo register for presidential run?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Han Duck-soo officially registers as a candidate in the 2025 South Korean presidential election before the registration deadline. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Withdrawals after registration will not be considered. 

The primary resolution source will be the National Election Commission however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Capitals vs. Hurricanes
description:
In the upcoming NHL game, scheduled for May 10 at 6:00PM ET:
If the Washington Capitals win, the market will resolve to “Capitals”.
If the Carolina Hurricanes win, the market will resolve to “Hurricanes”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Lee Jun-seok endorse Lee Jae-myung?
description:
This market will resolve to a listed candidate if Lee Jun-seok, officially endorses them or joins a unity ticket with them in a supporting role by June 2, 2025, 11:59 PM ET.

This market will resolve immediately as soon an official endorsement is made.

If Lee Jun-seok does not endorse another candidate or join a unity ticket with them in a supporting this market will resolve to “No endorsement“.

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Kim Moon-soo out as PPP presidential candidate?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Kim Moon-soo is ceases to be the official presidential candidate of the People Power Party (PPP) at any point by June 2, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An official announcement from Kim Moon-soo or the PPP of his withdrawal/replacement will qualify for a "Yes" resolution. 

The resolution source will be will be b a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Will Lee Jae-myung win less than 35% of the vote in the South Korea election?
description:
The 2025 South Korean presidential election will be held on June 3 to elect the next President of the Republic of Korea.

This market will resolve according to the popular vote share won by Lee Jae-myung.

If Lee Jae-myung does not participate in the election for any reason this market will resolve to the lowest bracket.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

This market will resolve based on the official vote count published by the National Election Commission of South Korea (https://www.nec.go.kr/engvote/main.jsp).
